results.adx_keywords: Basketball;Social Media;Morant, Ja (1999- );Memphis Grizzlies;National Basketball Assn
results.title: Memphis Grizzlies Guard Ja Morant Steps Away From Team
results.abstract: The Grizzlies said Morant would be away for at least two games but did not say why. Several people posted video clips on social media that appeared to show Morant holding a gun.

media.caption: Memphis Grizzlies guard Ja Morant will miss road games against the Los Angeles Clippers and the Los Angeles Lakers.

results.adx_keywords: Deaths (Obituaries);Actors and Actresses;Movies;Television;Drug Abuse and Traffic;Sizemore, Tom
results.title: Tom Sizemore, Intense Actor With a Troubled Life, Dies at 61
results.abstract: He earned praise for his work in films like “Saving Private Ryan” and “Black Hawk Down.” He also served prison time for drug possession and domestic abuse.

media.caption: Tom Sizemore, left, with Tom Hanks in “Saving Private Ryan” (1998). Mr. Sizemore and eight other actors from that film were nominated for a Screen Actors Guild Award for outstanding cast.

results.adx_keywords: Missing Persons;Nursing Homes;Elder Care;Dementia;DNA (Deoxyribonucleic Acid);Patricia Kopta;Pennsylvania;Puerto Rico
results.title: Pennsylvania Woman Who Disappeared in 1992 Is Found Alive in Puerto Rico
results.abstract: The family of Patricia Kopta, now 83, thought she had died years ago. They were stunned to learn that she had been on the island since at least 1999.

media.caption: Patricia Kopta was found after she shared tidbits about her past to employees at a nursing home in Puerto Rico that had been taking care of her for years.

results.adx_keywords: United States Politics and Government;Skin Cancer;Age, Chronological;Presidential Election of 2024;Biden, Joseph R Jr
results.title: Lesion Removed During Biden’s Physical Was Cancerous
results.abstract: President Biden’s physician said that the lesion was basal cell carcinoma, a common and relatively unaggressive form of skin cancer, and that no further treatment was needed.

media.caption: The site of President Biden’s biopsy has “healed nicely,” his doctor said.

results.adx_keywords: Breastfeeding;Infant Formulas;Bacteria;Babies and Infants
results.title: What Parents Should Know About Bacteria and Breast Pumps
results.abstract: Federal health officials are reminding parents of infants to properly sterilize breast pump equipment after a baby died last year from a rare bacterial infection.

media.copyright: Mary Mathis for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Airports;Airport Security;Evacuations and Evacuees;Bombs and Explosives;University Park Airport (State College, Pa);State College (Pa)
results.title: Pennsylvania Airport Closed After Suspicious Package Is Found in Checked Bag
results.abstract: The terminal at University Park Airport in State College, Pa., was evacuated on Friday night. Officials later said that there was nothing hazardous inside the bag.

media.caption: The passenger terminal at the University Park Airport in State College, Pa., was evacuated around 6:30 p.m. on Friday after a suspicious item was detected by airport security, officials said.

results.adx_keywords: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Amnesties, Commutations and Pardons;Content Type: Personal Profile;Bedford Hills Correctional Facility
results.title: Remember Pamela Smart? ‘To Die For’ Convict Now Seeks Mercy.
results.abstract: The woman who became a national sensation in 1990 after her teenage lover killed her husband has become a prison preacher. She hopes New Hampshire will set her free.

media.caption: Pamela Smart said she has apologized, and that it’s wrong the man who actually pulled the trigger is free and she is not.
media.copyright: Sara Hylton for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Deaths (Fatalities);Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Ellis County Sheriffs Office;Texas Department of Family and Protective Services;Texas;Italy, Texas
results.title: Woman Arrested After Three Children Are Killed in Texas
results.abstract: The killings happened on Friday in Italy, Texas, after a caseworker visited the home and ordered that the children be removed, officials said.
org_facet: Texas Department of Family and Protective Services

media.caption: Jerry Cozby, a deputy sheriff in Ellis County, Texas, left, at a news conference. Three children were found dead in Italy, Texas, on Friday.

results.adx_keywords: Doctors;Drugs (Pharmaceuticals);Drug Abuse and Traffic;Buprenorphine (Drug);Opioids and Opiates;Fentanyl;Methadone;Law and Legislation;Regulation and Deregulation of Industry;United States Politics and Government;Drug Enforcement Administration
results.title: More Doctors Can Now Prescribe a Key Opioid Treatment. Will It Help?
results.abstract: The federal government loosened regulations for buprenorphine, but health experts warn that entrenched problems around training and access could stall efforts to get people the medication.

media.caption: For over a decade, Randall Lambert has used buprenorphine, which has eased his opioid cravings as he managed an otherwise chaotic life.

results.adx_keywords: Divorce, Separations and Annulments;News and News Media;Social Media;Conway, George T III;Conway, Kellyanne;Trump, Donald J;Comey, James B;Fox News Channel
results.title: Former Trump Adviser Kellyanne Conway and George Conway Are Divorcing
results.abstract: The political odd couple had bewildered Washington when Ms. Conway was serving as an adviser to President Donald J. Trump and her husband was one of his fiercest critics.

media.caption: Kellyanne Conway and George T. Conway III, arriving at an event the day before Mr. Trump's inauguration as president in 2017.

results.byline: By Sapna Maheshwari and Amanda Holpuch
results.title: Why Countries Are Trying to Ban TikTok
results.abstract: Governments have expressed concerns that TikTok, which is owned by the Chinese company ByteDance, may endanger sensitive user data.

media.caption: TikTok has long denied allegations that it puts sensitive user data into the hands of the Chinese government.

results.title: Stranded in California’s Heavy Snow
results.abstract: Back-to-back storms left many people stuck as snow piled high. More is still in the forecast.

results.adx_keywords: Heart;Clinical Trials;Surgery and Surgeons;Medical Devices;Research;your-feed-science;your-feed-health;Abbott Laboratories;American College of Cardiology;Edwards Lifesciences Corporation;New England Journal of Medicine
results.title: New Treatment Could Help Fix the Heart’s ‘Forgotten Valve’
results.abstract: Patients with leaking tricuspid valves in a research trial saw improvements with a procedure that does not require a risky open-heart surgery.

media.caption: A scanning electron micrograph of a section of a human heart showing the tricuspid valve, upper right, seen from the right ventricle. Three to five percent of people over 65 have seriously leaking tricuspids.

results.adx_keywords: Muscles;Content Type: Service;Exercise;Heart;Elderly;Legs;Osteoporosis;Age, Chronological;internal-sub-only
results.title: 5 Exercises to Keep an Aging Body Strong and Fit
results.abstract: Declines in muscle and bone strength start earlier than you might think. Build a smart workout habit now.

media.copyright: Nicholas Sansone for The New York Times

results.title: Trump Asks Judge to Block Pence’s Testimony to Grand Jury
results.abstract: The former president’s lawyers cited executive privilege, a tactic they have used with other ex-Trump aides.

media.caption: Former Vice President Mike Pence is a key potential witness in the Justice Department’s investigation into former President Donald J. Trump’s attempts to hold on to power.

results.adx_keywords: Neo Nazi Groups;United States Defense and Military Forces;Terrorism;Decisions and Verdicts;Right-Wing Extremism and Alt-Right;Military Bases and Installations;Melzer, Ethan Phelan;United States Army;Order of the Nine Angles (Neo-Nazi Group)
results.title: Former Army Private Sentenced to 45 Years in Neo-Nazi Plot to Kill Soldiers
results.abstract: Prosecutors said he planned an attack on his own U.S. Army unit, sharing sensitive details about it with a white supremacist, neo-Nazi and pro-jihadist group.
des_facet: United States Defense and Military Forces
org_facet: Order of the Nine Angles (Neo-Nazi Group)

media.caption: A former member of the 173rd Airborne Brigade Combat Team was sentenced to 45 years in federal prison on Friday for plotting with a white supremacist group to attack his fellow soldiers, officials said.

results.title: Once the World’s Largest, a Hotel Goes ‘Poof!’ Before Our Eyes
results.abstract: The Hotel Pennsylvania in Manhattan was a virtual city within a city. But in the end, nothing could save it.

results.byline: By Jill Cowan and Vik Jolly
results.title: In Southern California, Snow Has Trapped People for Days
results.abstract: A week of intense snowfall in the San Bernardino Mountains has left residents and tourists rationing food and pleading for help.

media.caption: Debris from an avalanche blocked State Route 38 near Big Bear, Calif., on Thursday.

results.title: Why Alex Murdaugh’s Quick Conviction Worries Me
results.abstract: The case was built on a trove of digital data. Could the jury have given it due consideration in just three hours?

media.caption: Alex Murdaugh after his conviction on Thursday.
